mapper.select: SELECT id, main_sid, balance, actual_fee, create_date, adult_date, finsh_date, fee_name, oper_user, demo, STATUS, alipay_name, alipay_account FROM tb_rs_bill_flow WHERE main_sid = #{netSid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND create_date BETWEEN #{dateMin,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{dateMax,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY create_date DESC

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
